suncertify.pref
Class PreferencesFactoryImpl

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.pref.PreferencesFactoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.prefs.PreferencesFactory
public class PreferencesFactoryImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.prefs.PreferencesFactory

An implementation for java.util.prefs.PreferencesFactory used to load and store user and system preferences from properties file in current working directory.

This implementation for preferences API can only be used in a single user environment, system root preferences and user preferences are constructed only once.

The expected properties file name is suncertify.properties, prefix user. is used to distinguish user from system properties in this file, there is no need to include this prefix when passing key to getter methods for Preferences instances created by userRoot() because it is included when getting and persisting values.

Author:
Mohammad S. Abdellatif
